reviewText: This is a great product for any anime collector.

Warning to purchasers this DVD is not the complete series it's one disc and it's region locked will not play on DVD players in the US and Canada you will need a multi-region or region free DVD or Blu-ray player to watch it.

This DVD is NOT season 3.  It is disk 3 from season 1.  It contains chapters 6 Wolf and Silent Farewell and 7 Wolf and a Tail of Happiness.  As it is the original Japanese DVD as sold in Japan, there is NO English subtitles.  Finally, it is Region code 2 and will NOT play in US DVD players.
This is the 3rd Japanese release DVD of the first season of one of the greatest anime ever to make it to the states.

Season three of Wolf and Spice does not exist at this moment. Those who are trying to search of it should not buy this. Look around, season three is not out or not being made, but they are thinking of it being made. ;c Im sorry to break your little hearts. Amazon, this sell is a fake.
